Hymn.Arabic: اذكر يا رب أننا تراب نحن.
Hymn.English: 14 For He knows our frame; He remembers that we are dust.
15 As for man, his days are like grass.

Hymn.Arabic: ليس إلي الانقضاء يسخط ولا إلى الدهر يحقد.
Hymn.English: 9 He will not always strive with us, Nor will He keep His anger forever.

Hymn.Arabic: ليس حسب خطايانا عاملنا ولا كأثامنا كافئنا: هللويا.
Hymn.English: 10 He has not dealt with us according to our sins, Nor punished us according to our iniquities.     Alleluia
